title: Rush - A Show of Hands (resequenced and expanded by }{eywood)
description:
This is the video and CD versions of A Show Of Hands stitched together in the proper order of the Hold Your Fire tour. Nearly everything on the CD is used here, most versions being from a different night than the video. This is to avoid too much redundancy with the bootleg "Birmingham 88". Although this is the complete set of the HYF tour, two songs on the CD were recorded on the previous tour, and I left them in here so as not to omit any of the CD tracks.

By the way, the laserdisc version was used for this, not the DVD. Lock And Key is included from that source, as is the entire end portion of the show and a couple other bits. This means the entire thing is PCM audio, not the ac3 sound from a DVD

01 Three Stooges intro
02 The Big Money
03 Subdivisions
04 Marathon
05 Turn the Page
06 Prime Mover
07 Manhattan Project
08 Closer to the Heart
09 Red Sector A
10 Force Ten
11 Time Stand Still
12 Distant Early Warning
13 Lock And Key
14 Mission
15 Mystic Rhythms
16 Witch Hunt
17 Territories
18 YYZ
19 The Rhythm Method
20 The Spirit Of Radio
21 Tom Sawyer
22 2112 Overture
23 The Temples Of Syrinx
24 La Villa Strangiato
25 In The Mood
